channel.title: In need of major help
channel.description: Hello everyone; I just finished doing some minor coding to my server it's got a no-ip now and I was hoping to put it online so I went to the Mopar Server page and went to register my server but Moparscape says it's offline when it's not (I was online my server when I tried it) and I thought there was a problem with ip that I did with No-ip and there wasn't cause I even tried doing Run - cmd - ipconfig but it says it's not reconized? I'm using a D-Link Routor. Please Help!

item.title: In need of major help
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

www.portforward.com

Read full topic

item.title: In need of major help

item.description:
@V.I.P wrote:

[quote=“whackatre, post:3, topic:378159”][quote author=Anc13nts253 link=topic=474042.msg3466183#msg3466183 date=1294917101]
Okay, now portforward port 43594 with your router.
[/quote]

^^^ also allow the port 43594 through your firewall too[/quote]

And how do I do that again?

Read full topic

item.title: In need of major help
item.dc:creator: @V.I.P V.I.P.
item.description:
@V.I.P wrote:

Hello everyone; I just finished doing some minor coding to my server it’s got a no-ip now and I was hoping to put it online so I went to the Mopar Server page and went to register my server but Moparscape says it’s offline when it’s not (I was online my server when I tried it) and I thought there was a problem with ip that I did with No-ip and there wasn’t cause I even tried doing Run - cmd - ipconfig
but it says it’s not reconized?
I’m using a D-Link Routor. Please Help!

Read full topic
